name: Snow Queen
movement: walking speed of 40 feet, climbing speed of 20 feet
description: The Snow Queen embodies the essence of winter, with icy features and a commanding presence. She wields weapons that are imbued with cold magic.
memorable: Her ability to petrify foes in ice with her Cold Snap ability and manipulate the battlefield with snow and frost makes her a unique challenge.
goals: To manipulate and defeat her enemies while maintaining her dominion over winter.
relations: Potentially serves or collaborates with other ice-themed creatures or powerful Fey beings.
environment: Typically found in cold, wintry landscapes or icy realms.
strengths: Immune to cold damage and resistant to nonmagical physical attacks; possesses exceptional Dexterity and Charisma.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage which can significantly affect her in combat.
attacks: Make two melee attacks with claws or shoot ice bolts that deal cold damage and can reduce enemy speed.
most_powerful_ability: Cold Snap causes severe cold damage and can petrify enemies in ice.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing her to detect creatures even in near darkness.
skills: Possesses high perception skills with a +10 modifier, allowing her to be very aware of her surroundings.
additional_information: Can move across icy terrain effortlessly with Snow Walk.
Her Icy Weapons ability adds extra cold damage to attacks.
Has Legendary Resistance to succeed on saving throws despite failure.
Her Snowsight allows her to see through difficult icy visibility.
Can inflict vulnerability to cold damage with her abilities.
test_queries: powerful winter fey with ice abilities
fey creature that manipulates cold and ice
queen of winter that can blind and petrify
agile fey ruler with cold powers
cold damage immune fey with legendary resistance
